description: Engineering services to support software development and maintain projects for the Operations Group of the Space Exploration Operations and Infrastructure department.
duration_in_months: # of months the contract is scheduled to be active
full_summary:
### Notice of Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Request for Proposal Title**
9F054-230171 - Engineering Support Services Phase III

**Publication Date**
April 25, 2024

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
May 28, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST

**Document Number**
WS4527951776 - Doc4533353615

**Amendment Number**
5

**Procurement Category**

* SRV (Service)

**Procurement Method**

* Competitive: Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Description of Services Required**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), invites you to submit a proposal for the provision of resources specializing in maintenance engineering services and software development to support the Operations Group of the Space Exploration Operations and Infrastructure (SEOI) department. The successful bidder shall be responsible for providing the required resources and services as outlined in Annex A.

**Contracting Entity and End User**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* Address: 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

**Contact Information**

* Pierre-Alexandre Simard
* Email: pierre-alexandre.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Please see the attached notice URL for the full details of this request for proposal. [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19519426?extsite=MTk1MTk0
